name: import-data
description: Creates a database and collection as necessary and imports data into it.

scripts.setup: tsc && mongo --eval "let args={databaseName: '$DB', collectionName: '$COLL', schemaPath: '$SCHEMA'}" dist/index.js
scripts.setup-cases: tsc && mongo --eval "let args={databaseName: 'covid19', collectionName: 'cases', schemaPath: './../../data-service/schemas/cases.schema.json'}" dist/index.js
